verses.verse: Therefore will not we <S%H3372>fear<s%>, though the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4171>removed<s%>, and though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> be <S%H4131>carried<s%> into the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>;
Though the <S%H4325>waters<s%> there <S%H1993>roar<s%> and be <S%H2560>troubled<s%>, though the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>shake<s%> with the <S%H1346>swelling<s%> <S%H5542>there<s%>. Selah.

There is a <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H6388>streams<s%> of which shall make <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H6918>holy<s%> place of the <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
<S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H4131>her<s%>; she shall not be moved: <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H6437>her<s%>, and that right <S%H1242>early<s%>.
The <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H1993>raged<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> were <S%H4131>moved<s%>: he <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4127>melted<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with <S%H430>us<s%>; the God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H3212>Come<s%>, <S%H2372>behold<s%> the <S%H4659>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, what <S%H8047>desolations<s%> he has <S%H7760>made<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

He makes <S%H4421>wars<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he <S%H7665>breaks<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H7112>cuts<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> in <S%H7112>sunder<s%>; he <S%H8313>burns<s%> the <S%H5699>chariot<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Be <S%H7503>still<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H430>God<s%>: I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, I will be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is with <S%H430>us<s%>; the God of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is our <S%H4869>refuge<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
